name: frontend
description: A modern, fully-featured, real-time collaborative whiteboard application with room codes, passcode security, user roles, and powerful whiteboard tools like drawing, text, shapes, and image upload. This app is designed for both desktop and mobile devices, allowing multiple users to collaborate seamlessly in real-time. üåê
author: Nolly <contact@thenolle.com>

scripts.generate:htaccess:
echo 'RewriteEngine On

# If an existing asset or directory is requested go to it as it is
RewriteCond %{DOCUMENT_ROOT}%{REQUEST_URI} -f [OR]
RewriteCond %{DOCUMENT_ROOT}%{REQUEST_URI} -d
RewriteRule ^ - [L]

# If the requested resource does not exist, use index.html
RewriteRule ^ /index.html


# ¬© 2023 Nolly | Website: thenolle.com | Github: @TheNolle | Patreon: @_nolly' > dist/.htaccess
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.mjs --mode production && pnpm run generate:htaccess
